tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE driver_performance_metrics (
    driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trip_date DATE,
    trip_distance DECIMAL,
    average_speed DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE drivers (
  driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_name VARCHAR(50),
  total_distance INT,
  total_time INT,
  average_speed FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE trips (
  trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT REFERENCES drivers(driver_id),
  start_location VARCHAR(100),
  end_location VARCHAR(100),
  distance_covered INT,
  time_taken INT
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT REFERENCES drivers(driver_id),
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT,
  feedback_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE DriverPerformanceMetrics (
	driver_id INT,
	date DATE,
	total_distance FLOAT,
	speed_limit_exceeded INT,
	speeding_events INT
);

CREATE TABLE CoachingFeedback (
	feedback_id INT,
	driver_id INT,
	feedback_date DATE,
	feedback_text VARCHAR,
	coaching_session_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE CoachingSessions (
	session_id INT,
	driver_id INT,
	coach_id INT,
	session_date DATE,
	session_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE DriverDetails (
	driver_id INT,
	driver_name VARCHAR,
	driver_license_number VARCHAR,
	driver_phone_number VARCHAR,
	email_address VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE drivers (
 driver_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 driver_name VARCHAR(100),
 driver_email VARCHAR(100),
 driver_phone VARCHAR(20),
 driver_license VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE trips (
 trip_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 driver_id UUID,
 trip_date DATE,
 trip_distance DOUBLE,
 trip_duration INTERVAL
)

CREATE TABLE violations (
 violation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 trip_id UUID,
 violation_type VARCHAR(50),
 violation_date DATE,
 violation_penalty DOUBLE
)

CREATE TABLE feedback (
 feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 driver_id UUID,
 feedback_date DATE,
 feedback_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE coaching_sessions (
 session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 driver_id UUID,
 session_date DATE,
 session_topic VARCHAR(100),
 session_notes TEXT
)
